original_text: You ask, ‘Why is the Lord not happy with our gifts?’ The Lord knows that you men have not done the right thing with your wives. When you married as a young man, you promised to take care of your wife always. But you have sent her away, when the law says that you must stay with her as your wife.
korean_text: 너희는 이르기를 어찌 됨이니이까 하는도다 이는 너와 네가 어려서 맞이한 아내 사이에 여호와께서 증인이 되시기 때문이라 그는 네 짝이요 너와 서약한 아내로되 네가 그에게 거짓을 행하였도다

sentences.original_text: Why is the Lord not happy with our gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 주께서 우리의 제물에 기뻐하지 않으십니까

sentences.original_text: that you men have not done the right thing
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들이 옳은 일을 하지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: When you married as a young man
you promised to take care of your wife always
But you have sent her away
that you must stay with her as your wife
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그녀와 아내로 함께 머물러야 한다고
